header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Baking for a lesson, what happens in a lesson, half birthday celebrations, Tomodachi life, finding a book in Morrisons, other books
header.activity: Family talking about plans for Mum’s lesson
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, making arrangements, telling jokes
